name: Abnormal (analog limb)
description:
My submission for itch.io Weekly GameJam 137 "Flop"

A robot tries to re-build itself and exit the facility that keeps it prisoner.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

E - Interact

Tools used:

POLYGON - Sci-Fi City Pack from Synty Studios

Game Creator from Catsoft Studios (Behaviour Module)

Armor Icons from Icon8

made with Unity
